div.head: 大便硬
div.div: major relief with hardness; hard stools

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: major relief with hardness; hard stools

sense.def: Illness Sign of stools that are harder than normal and cannot be discharged easily. Shang han lun 傷寒論 148: 心下滿，口不欲食，大便硬，脈細 , “A feeling of fullness below the heart, loss of appetite, hard stools , and a subtle [movement in the] vessels”.
